hypothesis.primary: H1 (Translation): Agentic retrieval (LME+) will achieve QA accuracy within 5% of static retrieval (LME best = 72%), but at 2-3x higher latency/cost.
secondary: H2 (Method Ranking): Simple filesystem access will outperform specialized MCP memory tools in agentic contexts.
H3 (Retrieval Gating): Memory tool effectiveness is modulated by retrieval quality—tools provide no benefit when retrieval fails (Recall@10=0) or succeeds excellently (Recall@10>0.8).
